Faithwalkers Presents

Hashem Youth
Conference

"Salvation Is Here."

A transformative weekend designed to empower the next generation to walk in faith, discover their God-given purpose, and ignite a spiritual revival in our communities.

August 15-18, 2025
Downtown Arena, Main Hall

The Vision: Revival

Hashem Youth Conference isn't just an event; it's a spiritual encounter. Our vision is to create a space where young people can disconnect from the noise of the world and reconnect with their Creator.

Faith

Building a foundation that cannot be shaken.

Transformation

Renewing minds through the power of Christ.

Purpose

Unlocking the destiny Hashem has for you.

Speakers & Ministers

Experience powerful messages and anointed worship from world-class speakers and ministers dedicated to the youth.

Abraham Seowabor

Keynote Speaker

Founder of Faithwalkers with a passion for youth discipleship.

Abraham Seowabor

Worship Leader

Anointed worship leader bringing hearts to the throne of Hashem.

Abraham Seowabor

Youth Pastor

Dynamic speaker focused on biblical purpose and spiritual growth.

Abraham Seowabor

Missionary

Dedicated to global outreach and empowering young leaders.
